name: d3-tooltip-box
description: D3 plugin to build legendary tooltips

scripts.build-dev: npm run clean && browserify index.js -s d3TooltipBox > build/d3-tooltip-box.js -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] ]
scripts.build-prod: npm test && npm run build-dev && uglifyjs build/d3-tooltip-box.js -c -m -o build/d3-tooltip-box.min.js

author: roncr
